title: Phil the Pill and Friends Making Positive Choices
description: Phil the Pill and Friends Making Positive Choices is a wonderful children's book with cartoon characters encouraging young children to make positive choices. It is sure to make you smile, or even sing, as five children's songs are included to brighten up your day! The Author, M. Ann Machen Pritchard is one of the 50 Great Writers You Should Be Reading!
author: M. Ann Machen Pritchard
